verses.roman:
pūrva-varṣe jagadānanda 'ai' dekhibāre
prabhu-ājñā lañā āilā nadīyā-nagare

synonyms: pūrva-varṣe—in the previous year; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; āi—Śacīmātā; dekhibāre—to see; prabhu-ājñā lañā—taking the permission of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—came; nadīyā-nagare—to the city of Nadia.
translation: The previous year, Jagadānanda Paṇḍita, following the Lord's order, had returned to the city of Nadia to see Śacīmātā.
